name: Chronoblast: Maximum Force
description:
Chronoblast Maximum Force is a fast paced bullet shooter inspired by arcade classics. Keep your finger on the trigger at all times in this challenging arcade game.

  • Arcade soundtrack by HeavyViper
  • Multiple game modes
  • Challenging arcade stages
  • 5 playable ships and 3 pilots from the start giving 15 ship combinations
  • Unlockables to add even more combinations
  • Casual and competitive game modes, play for fun, or post your score against the world.
